artifacts.summary: Comprehensive analysis of paths to zero-sorry publication: recommends forward-only TruthLemma restructuring (removes 2 sorries) as Phase 1, with optional Zorn's lemma completion (eliminates axiom) as Phase 2

findings.phase1_complexity: Low - removes 2 sorries, minimal code changes
findings.phase2_complexity: Medium - completes Zorn's lemma, eliminates axiom
findings.completeness_impact: None - completeness theorems already sorry-free (use only forward direction)
